summary: Provides comparability patches for the Great Forest of Whiterun Hold mod﻿ for use in combination with a couple other mods.
descriptionHtml:
Provides comparability patches for the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67063]Great Forest of Whiterun Hold mod[/url] for use in combination with a couple other mods. This mod moves or removes trees so that they don't conflict with any of the supported buildings. The Cannabis patch also removes the Quest Item flag from the Cannabis Options so that they can be removed from the player's inventory.

The following patches are included:

[b]BBLuxurySuite_WhiterunHoldForest_Patch.esp[/b] - For use with [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11427]Bathing Beauties or Beefcake - Luxury Suite[/url]
[b]Cannabis_WhiterunHoldForest_Patch.esp[/b] - For use with [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8732]Cannabis Skyrim[/url]
[b]Nakahara_WhiterunHoldForest_Patch.esp[/b] - For use with [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64262]Nakahara - Akaviri House[/url]﻿

Install any of these ESPs, place after the other mods in load order.

OR install the merged ESP if you use all of above mods:

[b]WhiterunHoldForestCompabilityPatches.esp[/b]

Use Mod Organizer or have a painful life!
author: ciathyza
